content: A lot of the jumping through rings of fire is intended to weed out “false positive” candidates within companies. Its not preferable but its an easy crutch for companies to use when they just need people to get qualified candidates and nothing more. Feel free to prove me wrong, but i dont think this is an issue of privilege or gender, everybody goes through the same types of questioning in their interviews, male or female. Fortunately, nothing is stopping you from working on your own passion projects and making your own software products.
